summary: This is an email chain from August 24, 2019, forwarding a message from attorney Gloria Allred. Allred urgently contacts an unnamed recipient to arrange for an Epstein victim, who is described as an important witness, to fly to New York for a hearing the following Tuesday. The forwarded email highlights logistical coordination for a victim's court appearance.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Attorney who sends the original email, urgently trying to contact an unnamed recipient to arrange for an Epstein victim to travel to New York for a hearing.

events.title: Hearing in New York
events.description: A hearing is scheduled for the Tuesday following the email (August 27, 2019), for which an Epstein victim, described as an important witness, wishes to travel to New York.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim, described as an 'important witness' in an ongoing investigation, sought to travel to New York for a hearing scheduled for Tuesday, August 27, 2019.
Attorney Gloria Allred was urgently coordinating the victim's travel and attempting to contact an unnamed recipient to provide a telephone number.
The email chain, dated August 24, 2019, highlights active victim participation and witness coordination in legal proceedings shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
